name: v0.2.48.Final
body:
- [**bug**] Typo in hub_mysql5.ddl [#1408](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1408)
- [**bug**] In some cases, error details are not displayed in the [Issues] > [Validation Problems] section. [#1407](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1407)
- [**enhancement**] Need more info in README regarding compatible versions of Java [#1404](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1404)
- [**closed**] Integration between [ApiCurio] and [Microcks] is having an issue ... [#1401](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1401)
- [**question**] How to deploy apicurio back-end as well as front-end?  [#1394](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1394)
- [**closed**] Connect Apicurio with PostgreSQL [#1392](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1392)
- [**bug**] [docker-compose] distro not working properly ? [#1386](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1386)
- [**enhancement**] Improve on "Dereference All External $refs" [#1368](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1368)
- [**closed**] HTTP 403 After setting up a back-end API development environment [#1367](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1367)
- [**bug**] Previewing documentation is giving an error that it is not a valid JSON Schema [#1366](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1366)
- [**bug**] Error Instatiating Template [#1364](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1364)
- [**closed**] Running from Docker Setup keycloak won't start [#1361](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1361)
- [**bug**] QuickStart fails to start "ClassNotFoundException" [#1360](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1360)
- [**bug**] PROJECT_GENERATION_FAILED.txt [#1354](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1354)
- [**question**] Unable To Link Enterprise Github With Apicurio [#1345](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1345)
- [**question**] JDBC_PARAMS: "useSSL=false" is required in docker-compose.keycloak.yml to prevent error [#1343](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1343)
- [**enhancement**] Create a simple process to deploy Apicurio Studio in Openshift [#1342](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1342)
- [**enhancement**][**task**] Create quarkus docker compose distro [#1321](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1321)
- [**question**] run apicurio-studio on kubernetes [#944](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/944)
